feature.label: iSphere Core (required)
feature.description: The "iSphere Core Feature" is the heart of the iSphere Plugins and provides service that are not specific to RDi or WSDC. Services provided are: Source Member Compare Editor, Source File Search Page, Message File Search Page, Binding Directory Editor, Spooled Files view and export and more.
